subject: Design
title: The McMansion: More Is Less
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The McMansion: More Is Less.

hook.text: In the 1990s, American houses doubled in size while families shrank. Design went off the rails.

buildup.text: McMansions feature two-story foyers, multiple rooflines, and columns that support nothing.

twist.text: McMansions became the internet's favorite design joke. 'McMansion Hell' blog gets millions of views.

climax.text: The McMansion shows what happens when size replaces design thinking.

punchline.text: Bigger isn't better. It's just bigger.

quiz.question: What is a common criticism of McMansion design?
options: Incoherent mixing of multiple architectural styles
